<div class="text-regular">Total number of wins, including level 2 races. First tiebreaker is number of 2nd places, then number of 3rd places.</div>
<form action="rankings.php"><ul class="filter"><li><div class="label">Date</div><div><select class="" name="date"><option value="2022-11-20">2022-11-20</option><option value="2022-11-20">2022-11-20</option><option value="2022-11-20">2022-11-20</option><option value="2021-12-31">2021-12-31</option></select></div></li>
</ul><input type="submit" name="filter" value="Filter"><input type="hidden" name="p" value="me"><input type="hidden" name="s" value="wins-nations"></form>
<b>0/</b> results.
